verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>letter<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> whom <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%>

<S%H310>(after<s%> that <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> the <S%H1377>queen<s%> <S%H5631>mother,<s%> the eunuchs, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H2796>craftsmen,<s%> and the <S%H4525>smiths,<s%> had <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>),

by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H501>Elasah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> and <S%H1587>Gemariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> (whom <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>), <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to all the <S%H1540>captivity,<s%> whom I have caused to be carried away <S%H1473>captive<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon:<s%>
<S%H1129>Build<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5193>them;<s%> and plant <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> and <S%H3205>father<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H582>husbands,<s%> that they may <S%H3205>bear<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1121>daughters;<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H4591>there,<s%> and don't be diminished.

<S%H1875>Seek<s%> the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> where I have caused you to be carried away <S%H1540>captive,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for <S%H7965>it;<s%> for in its peace you shall have <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H5030>Don't<s%> let your prophets who are in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7080>you,<s%> and your diviners, <S%H5377>deceive<s%> <S%H8085>you;<s%> neither listen to your <S%H2472>dreams<s%> which you cause to be <S%H2492>dreamed.<s%>
For they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> to you in my <S%H8034>name:<s%> I have not <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5002>them,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6310>After<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H4390>accomplished<s%> for <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H6965>you,<s%> and perform my <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> toward <S%H7725>you,<s%> in causing you to return to this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> that I <S%H2803>think<s%> toward <S%H5002>you,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and not of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H8615>hope<s%> and a <S%H319>future.<s%>
You shall <S%H7121>call<s%> on <S%H1980>me,<s%> and you shall go and <S%H6419>pray<s%> to <S%H8085>me,<s%> and I will listen to you.
You shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4672>me,<s%> and find <S%H1875>me,<s%> when you shall search for me with all your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

I will be <S%H4672>found<s%> by <S%H5002>you,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and I will turn <S%H7725>again<s%> your <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> and I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from all the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and from all the <S%H4725>places<s%> where I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H5002>you,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and I will bring you <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> from where I caused you to be carried away <S%H1540>captive.<s%>
Because you have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has raised us <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> in <S%H894>Babylon;<s%>

thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning the <S%H4428>king<s%> who <S%H3427>sits<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and concerning all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in this <S%H5892>city,<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> who <S%H3318>haven't<s%> gone forth with you into <S%H1473>captivity;<s%>

thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> <S%H7971>Behold,<s%> I will send on them the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and will <S%H5414>make<s%> them like <S%H8182>vile<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> that <S%H398>can't<s%> be eaten, they are so <S%H7455>bad.<s%>

I will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them to be <S%H2189>tossed<s%> back and forth among all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to be an object of <S%H423>horror,<s%> and an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> where I have driven <S%H5080>them;<s%>

because they have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to my <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with which I <S%H7971>sent<s%> to them my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> <S%H8085>them;<s%> but you would not hear, <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> therefore the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all you of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> whom I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> away from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> concerning <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6964>Kolaiah,<s%> and concerning <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> to you in my <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will deliver them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and he shall <S%H5221>kill<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes;<s%>

and of them shall be taken <S%H3947>up<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> by all the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> who are in <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> you like <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> and like <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7033>roasted<s%> in the <S%H784>fire;<s%>

because they have <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with their <S%H7453>neighbors<s%>' <S%H802>wives,<s%> and have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> which I <S%H6680>didn't<s%> command <S%H3045>them;<s%> and I am he who knows, and am <S%H5707>witness,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Concerning <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite<s%> you shall <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>speaks<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Because you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> in your own <S%H8034>name<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who are at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and to <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to all the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H3548>priest<s%> in the place of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that there may be <S%H6496>officers<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for every <S%H376>man<s%> who is <S%H7696>mad,<s%> and makes himself a <S%H5012>prophet,<s%> that you should <S%H5414>put<s%> him in the <S%H6729>stocks<s%> and in <S%H4115>shackles.<s%>
Now <S%H1605>therefore,<s%> why have you not rebuked <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H6069>Anathoth,<s%> who makes himself a prophet to <S%H5012>you,<s%>

because he has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to us in <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1931>The<s%> captivity is <S%H752>long:<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5193>them;<s%> and plant <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit?<s%>
<S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> this <S%H5612>letter<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet.<s%>
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7971>Send<s%> to all them of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite:<s%> Because <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> has <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> to <S%H7971>you,<s%> and I didn't send <S%H982>him,<s%> and he has caused you to trust in a <S%H8267>lie;<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6485>Behold,<s%> I will punish <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite,<s%> and his <S%H2233>seed;<s%> he shall not have a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> this <S%H5971>people,<s%> neither shall he <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> that I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because he has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
